game.name: Russian Fishing 4
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Stats
game.shortDescription: 러시안 낚시 4는 RPG 요소가 있는 낚시 시뮬레이터입니다. 스토리 라인은 없으며 전체 과정은 개방적이고 자유롭게 돌아다닐 수 있으며 게임을 플레이할 수 있다는 개념을 기반으로 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Russian Fishing 4 is a fishing simulator with RPG elements. There is no story line and the whole process is based on the concept of an open, free to roam and free to play game.

reviewHighlights.text: Fun game, all though almost 300h in and still didn't catch a Russian. The name is a bit miss leading.
Incredible game to relax and have a beer, great analog for irl fishing. challenging enough that it is exciting to get a bite, But not too easy to get...
